 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרַח‎</span>] **verb** ==rub== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic (Talmud) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַח‎</span>; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***anoint, smear***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂאוּ דְּבֶלֶת תְּאֵנִים וְיִמְרְחוּ עַלהַֿשְּׁחִין‎</span> [[Isa.38.21|Isa 38:21]] let them take a cake of figs ***and rub*** it upon the eruption (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים‎</span> in \|\| [[2Kgs.20.7|2Kgs 20:7]]). — On <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרוח‎</span> see above 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶרְחָב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶרְחַבְיָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחב‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶרְחָק‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחק‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְחֶ֫שֶׁת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחשׁ‎</span>.
